Texts.Chs: 你似乎遇到了Zeldia？已经没有太多时间可以浪费，还有许多战斗在等着我们。
Texts.Eng: I take it you have met Zeldia? Nevertheless, there is little time to lose. More enemies await us.

Texts.Chs: 我得留下来确保企鹅不会卷土重来。很感谢你的帮忙。
Texts.Eng: I will stay to secure this area and ensure the penguins do not re-infest it. Please, move on without me.

Texts.Chs: 冒昧地问一下，似乎你需要帮助？
Texts.Eng: My apologies for dropping in unannounced. You looked like you needed help.

Texts.Chs: 我叫Jinrei，隶属于SMASH，我们是这个城市的守卫。
Texts.Eng: My name is Jinrei; I am a Guardian who fights with SMASH to protect this fine city.

Texts.Chs: 企鹅的进攻已经迫在眉睫，相信你可以找到更多与我一样的人，他们可以帮助你。
Texts.Eng: The penguin threat must be eliminated at all costs; I am sure you will find more of my allies ahead to aid you.
